pageProduct.name: White Glo Accelerator Blue Light Refill Single Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Accelerator Refill Gel is a dentist blue light teeth whitening solution with visible results from day 1.

Use the White Glo whitening gel with your White Glo Accelerator LED device (LED Accelerator not included in this pack) to remove stains, yellowing and discoloration from the tooth surface. From just the first use, your teeth will start apearing whiter and brighter.

- Fast, safe and effective!

Grab this handy White Gloe Light Activated Teeth Whitening Gel refill for your White Glo Accelerator LED Device (LED Accelerator not included in this pack). Includes one 100mL Gel.

For use with White Glo Accelerator.

Within no time you will have a glamorous white smile.

Boxed Contents: Light Activated Whitening Gel 100mL x 1

Size: 100mL

Warnings

Read full instructions inside carefully before first use. This product is not to be consumed. Use by children under 12 years of age or pregnant women is not recommend. People who have braces, colitis, bad gums, exposed roots, ulcers, periodontal disease must not use this product. Avoid prolonged contact of the beaching gel with the gums. If tooth sensitivity or adverse symptoms occur cease use immediately.

Ingredients

Proplene Glycol, Glycerine, 9% Carbamide Peroxide, Carbomer 940, Triethanolamine, Peppermint Oil, Bromelain, Papain.

Directions

To be used with the LED Blue Lig ht Acccelarator ( Sold Separately).
